title: Need help! The application was unable to start correctly (0x0000005)
body:
Hello guys,
I recently came to this error while trying to play some aram matches. I first started my launcher and this error would say:
jpatch.exe - Application Error The application was unable to start correctly (0x0000005) Click OK to close the application.
Now, i restarted the game and this error disappeared. But when I tried to start the game, the same error, although this time on league of legends.exe started showing and would send me back to the launcher all the time.
Does anyone have any idea how to fix this? I tried using the repair tool and re installing and no luck.

replies.body:
Hey,

so i found this post and it seems lots of PC programs/applications make the game crashes. I needed like a week to find out what was the problem at my place, but never thought it would be it. In my case the problem was Razer Synapse. I got the BlackWidow Chroma keyboard and Darthadder Chroma mouse, so u need this Razers app to conf. all the lights and settings but i dont understand why and how that inflicts to loading the game?

I log in normaly, go to a lobby, going into champ selection... everything ok, and then when the game should start loading that error pops up. I closed and restarted the client multiple times, reconected 1 milion times and no go. Then i updated GPU drivers and nothing so then i started closing running apps in Start bar. I closed Razers Synapse too and look at that... the game worked. I repeated the bug few times just to be sure and thats it.

I got Avast Free and it doest bother the game and Hamachi and Steam too... 

So what is the problem between the game and Razer Synapse? Anyone?

I'm having the same issue right now as well and was wondering if you ended up fixing it. The only fix I found was going into Task Manager and closing everything related to Razer Synapse but I don't want to do that every time I play.
You hit the nail on head bro. I think ill send a message to razer as well because they make their perifrials for games like league.
Dude thank you so much you saved me ;w;
This fixed it for me, thanks. Weird how razer synapse makes league crash lol
To any1 currently having this problem league of legends file location and delete leagueoflegends.exe then launch lol.launcher.admin.exe, this got the client up and running for me again. T
I had to delete the LeagueClient in my files, but thanks :)  I had tried everything else and this is what worked

I do know that this thread is very old, HOWEVER; for me these "fixes" did NOT work. So if those fixes do not work for you either, i suggest that you go ahead and check if your Java is updated to the latest version. I got the exact same error and tried everything but then i just found out that it was because my Java wasnt updated. I hope it works for you. 
Have a good one.
Razer Synapse seems to be my issue as well. Nothing i can do but wait for a synapse/league patch. until then synapse stays off.

> [{quoted}](name=HighlyStrung82,realm=OCE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dV3E9G7u,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2017-07-23T14:15:16.331+0000)
>
> Razer Synapse seems to be my issue as well. Nothing i can do but wait for a synapse/league patch. until then synapse stays off.

Yea I'm having the same issue and if you go into Task Manager and close everything related to Razer Synapse, it works. The thing is I don't really want to have to go to Task Manager and close the processes every single time I want to play.

Hey Lukes MN,

I'm gonna copy+paste what I said in another thread that should help resolve the 0x0000005 error for you:

We've noticed players running AVG are seeing this error after the new patch. Making sure League of Legends is allowed as an Exception through your Firewall should resolve this issue. Here's a [guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) that can show you how to allow League to your Exceptions list. 

If this doesn't resolve your issue, go ahead and [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our Techs can help troubleshoot this issue.

Hey @Digital , thanks for the advice.
Unforuntately that did not fix my issue. I added both executables to the exceptions list of AVG. Although i did find a work-around. Simply to disable AVG temporarely seems to work to launch games. I will go ahead and submit a ticket anyway

Reinstalled the game, it finally allowed me to log in, the whole thing should be fine now, you might wanna consider this as your last option though as the game is getting larger and larger as time passes.

> [{quoted}](name=Lukas MN,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dV3E9G7u,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-03-19T13:07:24.461+0000)
>
> Hello guys,
> I recently came to this error while trying to play some aram matches. I first started my launcher and this error would say:
> jpatch.exe - Application Error The application was unable to start correctly (0x0000005) Click OK to close the application.
> Now, i restarted the game and this error disappeared. But when I tried to start the game, the same error, although this time on league of legends.exe started showing and would send me back to the launcher all the time.
> Does anyone have any idea how to fix this? I tried using the repair tool and re installing and no luck.
i have a thing poping up whan i open league and i cant idk what i need to do what do i try someone tell me {{summoner:3}}

i get the same error message when i click "Launch" at the top of my client. google doesnt help, nothing on this forum doesnt help, disabling windows firewall doesnt help, deleted avg and restarted, it still didnt help, and making firewall rule exceptions doesnt help. someone needs an actual intelligent and technological answer to this crap.
Im having this error code for 4 days without finding fix in any thread :(
Im having this problem to! if I try to launch the login panel this happens to me with the same error code. And its not because of Avas, ect.
i am having the same issue too and its a new laptop i have updated all the drivers i am able to play all the triple A titles yet . League of legends not working
I am having the same issue. I do not have AVG or Avast and I'm not sure why I haven't been able to play for the last patch or two.
I have this problem too :(
i had the same problem tried everything you guys said, what worked for me was to dele avast antivirus
None of this worked for me. I turned off Avast firewall, updated java amongst other things and I am still getting the same error message.

Had the same problem and this thread saved me from an AFK penalty. For AVG users disable permanently the "Software analyzer" component (not sure if that's the name because my interface is not in English). You can do this by going to Settings > Components and disabling it. This worked for me with League and with many other games! Hope it works with you guys!
BTW THE SAME EXACT THING IS HAPPENING TO ME AND I DONT KNOW WHAT AM I SUPPOSED TO DO TO FIX IT, WHENEVER I LAUNCH THE CLIENT, THE ERROR COMES UP...
I'm having the exact same issue trying to uninstall and install I'll update you on that
Thank you so much for telling us the reason causing the issue. AVG has been annoying a lot i am just going to uninstall it and use another anti-virus.

I had same problem,but I didnt anyhting like u guys tried.I have Avast Antivirus and I just turned it off for 10mins and it worked.For AVG users I recommend to try it {{champion:21}} btw miss fortune is sexy
